Html:
Hi Laurent,

do you have any timeline for the (on Jan. 2nd promissed) installer?

Regards
Manfred

Hi,

I don't have the MSI finalized but I have all the pieces ready. What do you need?

Laurent

Hi Laurent,

thank you for the fast repsonse.
I love your VS Integration (snippets and templates).

So what I want is to have them "up to date" with the newest Version (WP8, WPF 4.5 are my targest).

Manfred

Sure,

I assume VS12?

For the templates, you can use the latest VSIX at http://sdrv.ms/UZngfo .

Unfortunately I cannot install the snippets using the VSIX (ridiculous, I know...) but the snippets didn't change in the latest version. If you need them anyway let me know and I'll send them to you with a short checklist of how to install them.

Cheers
Laurent

Thank you Laurent,

this helped me a lot.
For the snippets - no Problem - I can pull them from source and install manually.

Manfred

Awesome, happy it helped.

Cheers
Laurent
